article_title: Simple holiday appetizers with Carly and Danielle
article_text:
More Video...

If you're not sure how many guests will be attending your holiday party, or you need a quick recipe to bring to a host's house, try one of these simple holiday appetizers.

Websites like Pinterest are filled with simple finger food recipes to feed your family and friends.

Try taking advantage of a crock pot, so you can cook other dishes or get set up while you wait. Check out our videos and try out these recipes for yourself!
